name: qr-saas-platform
description: QR Code SaaS Platform with Microservices Architecture

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:qr" "npm run dev:analytics" "npm run dev:file" "npm run dev:notification"
scripts.setup:services: cd services/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../user-service && npm install && cd ../qr-service && npm install && cd ../analytics-service && npm install && cd ../file-service && npm install && cd ../notification-service && npm install
scripts.build: cd shared && npm run build && cd ../services/api-gateway && npm run build && cd ../user-service && npm run build && cd ../qr-service && npm run build && cd ../analytics-service && npm run build && cd ../file-service && npm run build && cd ../notification-service && npm run build
scripts.test: cd services/api-gateway && npm test && cd ../user-service && npm test && cd ../qr-service && npm test
scripts.lint: cd services/api-gateway && npm run lint && cd ../user-service && npm run lint && cd ../qr-service && npm run lint
